geometry.name: Geometry
geometry.description: Objects that contain visual geometry data

rigging.name: Rigging
rigging.description: Objects for animation and deformation control

rendering.name: Rendering
rendering.description: Objects that affect how scenes are rendered

descriptions.MESH: Polygon geometry made of vertices, edges, and faces. Use it for solid forms and surface edits.
descriptions.CURVE: Spline-based geometry with a direction. Useful for paths, profiles, and procedural lines.
descriptions.SURFACE: NURBS surface for smooth, mathematically precise geometry. Common in CAD workflows.
descriptions.META: Implicit surface that blends with nearby metaballs. Good for organic shapes.
descriptions.FONT: Text geometry that can be converted to mesh or curve. Supports custom fonts.
descriptions.VOLUME: Volumetric data like smoke, fog, or imported OpenVDB files.
descriptions.CURVES: New hair/curves system for strands and fur. More efficient than particle hair.
descriptions.POINTCLOUD: Collection of points without connecting geometry. Used for effects and simulations.
descriptions.GPENCIL: 2D drawing strokes in 3D space. Combines illustration with 3D workflow.
descriptions.ARMATURE: Skeleton for character animation. Bones deform mesh via weights.
descriptions.LATTICE: Cage deformer that warps geometry non-destructively. Good for broad shape changes.
descriptions.CAMERA: Viewpoint for rendering. Defines what the final image captures.
descriptions.LIGHT: Light source for illumination. Types: Point, Sun, Spot, Area.
descriptions.LIGHT_PROBE: Captures lighting for real-time rendering (EEVEE). Types: Sphere, Plane, Volume.
descriptions.EMPTY: Transform-only placeholder. Used as parent, target, or controller.
descriptions.SPEAKER: 3D audio source for spatial sound in animations.

influence.selectObject: Select an object in the scene to inspect its influences

types.NODES: Procedural stack based on node graph (Geometry Nodes).
types.ARRAY: Duplicates geometry in a linear or radial pattern.
types.BEVEL: Chamfers edges to create softer corners.
types.DISPLACE: Offsets vertices based on a texture or value.
types.BOOLEAN: Combines geometry with union, difference, or intersect.
types.CAST: Shapes mesh toward sphere, cylinder, or cube.
types.CURVE: Deforms mesh along a curve object.
types.HOOK: Deforms mesh vertices with an empty or bone.
types.LATTICE: Deforms mesh using a lattice cage.
types.MESH_DEFORM: Deforms mesh using another mesh as cage.
types.SURFACE_DEFORM: Binds mesh to follow surface of another.
types.EDGE_SPLIT: Splits edges by angle or mark.
types.MASK: Hides parts of mesh by vertex group.
types.DYNAMIC_PAINT: Paints or deforms based on interaction.

nodeHelp.nodeNotFound: I don't know this node yet, but I'll learn it soon!
